column4: Are you using Ubuntu for private use? Why do you prefer it over Windows?
arent new things lagging behind for nomral users? like wireless support was poor at least a couple of years ago and youtube wasnt working in firefox on linux

there is no such thing as "the best system for everything". Everything has better and worse points, it's all a matter of weighing those points against each other. For some that means windows, for some linux, for some mac.
